sentence.Network_en: One surface is black, the other is pea green.
sentence.Network_cn: 一面为黑色, 一面为水绿色.

sentence.Network_en: She wears a pea green full - length skirt , which makes her look very lovely.
sentence.Network_cn: 她穿着一条豆青色的长裙, 显得十分活泼.

sentence.Network_en: Revenues from "green taxes" could then be channelled back into energy efficiency.
sentence.Network_cn: 从“绿色税收”得来的收入便可回过头来用于提高能效。
